name: FHL
description:
About First Hosted Limited (FHL)
First Hosted, Ltd is a consultancy providing operational and software systems advice, professional services, training and support.
Established as Europe’s #1 NetSuite solution provider, First Hosted Ltd is able to help organisations to support and improve performance and growth in a way not possible with conventional techniques.
 
Clients include international organisations, PLC’s and UK brand leaders operating in ecommerce, wholesale and distribution, retail and professional services.
First Hosted Ltd’s team of qualified professionals offers straight forward advice that delivers results.
